TopicTitle: Where can I find good Battleships?

Articles.Content: Don't know if this is the right thread, but does anyone know where can find any Kerbin-water based battleships? There's an add-on for BDArmory that adds giant Naval guns, but I have nothing to use it on. Mods, move to the correct forum if this is not where it belongs. Thanks!

You'll find craft files for all kinds of ships (space, water or otherwise) in the Spacecraft Exchange section of the forum.

JR

Battleships? on World of Warships maybe...

This is Kerbal Space Program... not Kerbal Marine Corps...

Battleships? on World of Warships maybe...

This is Kerbal Space Program... not Kerbal Marine Corps...

But... But... giant naval cannons.

You'll find craft files for all kinds of ships (space, water or otherwise) in the Spacecraft Exchange section of the forum.

JR

Yeah, I searched the forums as well as on google, but all of them seemed to be outdated, i.e. built before 0.90, or with the old wing parts, etc.

This one is a cargo ship, but I'm sure you could trun it into a battleship by adding guns and armor.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132126-Medium-Cargo-Ship-Aranxahttp://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132126-Medium-Cargo-Ship-Aranxa

And here's a submarine:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131860-K-Class-Submarine

JR

This one is a cargo ship, but I'm sure you could trun it into a battleship by adding guns and armor.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132126-Medium-Cargo-Ship-Aranxahttp://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132126-Medium-Cargo-Ship-Aranxa

JR

Mother of god.... That is amazing. And it will do well for my nefarious purposes. Thanks JR, I'll be giving you some rep for sure.

Not a problem, I'm sure Azimech and Flying Beaver are happy to have you playing with their creations. Have fun!

JR
Oh my goodness, when did all of this stuff become possible in KSP?! I've gotta get back in the game asap
Yep, Ship Exchange is what you're looking for, and now, you're in it. (Thread moved.)

Where can I find good Battleships?

I've always been able to find them in museums, or failing that, on the seafloor

Seems to me the "good" battleships shouldn't be on the sea floor!
